name: Bard/Rdd that is also a healer
author: OakrinTheCrow

posts.author: OakrinTheCrow
posts.content: At this point in time I'm planning on being a Bard/Red dragon disciple, but in my group of friends that I'm going to be playing with, we don't really have a healer. Is there any decent way to make a red dragon disciple that is also a healer?

posts.author: OakrinTheCrow
posts.content: PvM and Full Epic, If you can.

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
Frontload it with Cleric. Like Cleric16/Bard4 pre epic. Thats all the healing you'll need. After that go bard-RDD however you like.

Sent fra min SM-G950F via Tapatalk

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
You could go Cleric 12, the Bard 4, Rdd 4 pre epic, but since that would postpone the vital heal spell, I won't recommend it. Cleric16/bard14/RDD10 is a strong character. Cleric26/Bard4/RDD10can be considered, but you seem to want more bard. Bard song and curse song alone makes a huge difference in a party.

Sent fra min SM-G950F via Tapatalk

posts.author: traballacoilupi
posts.content:
Well, I use cleric 26 bard 4 rdd 10 a lot, beautiful deva-critting self-buffing disaster machine, albeit not many skillpoints. And, with high level undispellable cleric, bard song doesn't look that important IMO.
Just take the 4th bard level after lvl 36 for UMD and Tumble dump!
